text:
After a desperate battle over EnoRail,
the one left standing until the very end was—

name: Saotome
text:
I will never again
fall to my knees...!
If it's to protect Enoshima...!

—It was Saotome.
He stood barely, his knees trembling,
supported by his great flag.

name: Enoshiman?
text:
Ugh...!
I-I can't afford
to fall here...!

name: Enoshiman?
text:
I...
the heroes...!

Shiratori, muttering under his breath,
squeezed out his last words,
and collapsed forward.

—He seemed to have lost consciousness.
His eyes closed as if he was asleep,
and he became completely still.

options.text: We managed to stop him somehow...

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
It was a tough... battle.
Is this the strength of Shiratori's feelings...?

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
If it was just us,
we might not have been able
to stop Shiratori-san...

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Yes... Right.
Well done, Saotome.
Not bad for a first battle.

name: Saotome
text:
Yohack-kun, Astar-kun.
It was good that I could be of help to everyone,
even just a little bit.

name: Saotome
text:
And you too, [Player]-kun.
Thank you very much for giving
me the power to fight...!

The heroes nodded and
praised each other's efforts.

Interrupting their conversation,
[Player]'s device emitted the sound of a notification.

name: Alend
text:
[Player]!
Sorry for the short notice after the battle,
but you have to stop EnoRail immediately!

name: Senthak
text:
A few kilometers ahead,
we found a missing rail point!
It might be the work of monsters!

name: Senthak
text:
At that speed, you'll reach it in a few minutes,
so if you don't hurry, EnoRail will
become fish food!

name: Alend
text:
At this rate, the villagers' lives
will be severely affected!
You must prevent the derailment at all costs!

name: Senthak
text:
And,
please come back safely!
[Player]-kun!

name: Saotome
text:
[Player]-kun!
Everyone, come with me!
We must hurry and stop EnoRail!

name: Saotome
text:
There's no replacement for EnoRail!
We cannot afford to lose this vehicle!

[Player] and the others began
to act as if they were shot.

The group carried the unconscious Shiratori,
moved to EnoRail's coupling section, and
entered the vehicle through the connecting door.

name: Saotome
text:
The lead car is this way!
If we move to the driver's seat,
and apply the emergency brakes...!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Then the train will stop, right!?
Understood, Saotome-san!
Let's hurry!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
That seems to be the best way.
Now, let's run, [Player]!

Passing through several cars,
the heroes arrived at the lead car.

The instruments in the driver's seat displayed
a warning that the maximum speed was exceeded,
and the emergency alarm lamp was constantly flashing.

name: Saotome
text:
Speed, 260...!?
Wh-Why isn't the
automatic brake working!?

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
The brake isn't working?
What does that mean, Saotome?

name: Saotome
text:
As a safety measure, EnoRail is designed to automatically
apply the brakes when a certain speed is exceeded!

name: Saotome
text:
At this speed, the brake
should have definitely been working...!

options.text: We have to stop it quickly!
You said you could move it, right?

name: Saotome
text:
O-Of course!
To be honest, I've never done it before, but...!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...Saotome.
I'm asking this just in case,
but you're not joking, are you?

name: Saotome
text:
Unfortunately, it's not a joke!
We regularly hold training sessions at the office,
but this is my first time touching the real thing...!

name: Saotome
text:
But the manual is in my head!
Please put your trust in me for now!

[Player] and the heroes
watched Saotome with bated breath.

name: Saotome
text:
Um, let's see...!
I think it was like this...!

Saotome desperately tried to recall his memory
as he got into the driver's seat,
and reached out to the hologram interface.

—And, with his trembling hands,
he wore a desperate expression.

name: Saotome
text:
...It's no use!
It's not responding at all!?

options.text: Does this mean there's nothing we can do!?

text:
Seeing [Player]'s reaction,
Saotome waved his hands wildly.

name: Saotome
text:
N-No, that's not what I mean, the control is currently locked!
So it can't be operated from the driver's seat or from outside!

name: Saotome
text:
As expected of Shiratori-kun,
he's done a very thorough job...!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Is this the time to be saying that!?
Is there no other way!?

name: Saotome
text:
If there was, I would have
done it ages ago!

name: Saotome
text:
Ugh...!
What should I do...!

Yohack gently patted Saotome's shoulder,
who was panicking.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
I completely understand now!
In other words, we just need to
release the electronic lock!

And Yohack turned to [Player]
and smiled brightly.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Then leave it to me!
[Player]-san, please!

Understanding Yohack's intention,
[Player] approved the transformation.

As [Player] overwrote the approval,
Yohack was back in a mechanic-style suit.

In his right hand,
a key-shaped Parallel Weapon
was equipped.

name: Yohack
text:
It's alright now!
As long as you don't give up,
there's always an exit!

name: Yohack
text:
"Unlock"!
Omnes Clavis!
Leave even the electronic locks to me!

Yohack's Parallel Weapon instantly
unlocked the hologram interface's lock.

And the next moment,
the interface's operation authority
was granted to Saotome.

name: Saotome
text:
Th-That's right...!
I completely panicked and forgot, but
Yohack-kun was a locksmith hero...!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...With this ability,
it might be easy to deliver presents
inside children's homes.

name: Yohack
text:
Astar-san!?
This ability of mine, I'm pretty sure it
isn't to be used for illegal entry!?

name: Saotome
text:
Thank you, Yohack-kun!
Now if I apply the emergency brake,
I can stop EnoRail...!

Saotome recalled the manual,
and, though his hands were a bit unsteady,
activated the emergency brake.

name: Saotome
text:
No doubt, this is it!
Emergency brake, activated!!

name: Driver's Seat Screen
text:
—Attention to all cars, the emergency brake has been activated.
Please brace yourselves for an emergency stop.

With a tremendous electronic sound,
the train's speed began to gradually decrease.
However—

name: Driver's Seat Screen
text:
—Emergency brake in operation.
Distance to complete stop,
approximately 2,422 meters.

name: Saotome
text:
Oh no!
At this rate, we won't be able to stop
before the damaged section Senthak-kun identified!?

name: Saotome
text:
It's going too fast!
The braking distance is too long,
at this rate, it'll definitely derail!

options.text: I had a feeling this would happen, but!

text:
Saotome checked the instruments in the driver's seat,
and confirmed EnoRail's status.

name: Saotome
text:
Damn it!
The brake finally worked, and yet—

name: Saotome
text:
EnoRail wasn't even designed
to operate at such speeds in the first place!

name: Yohack
text:
Um...
I really don't want to understand, but if this
keeps going, are we going to sink into Enoshima's sea...!?

Astar spoke to Yohack and Saotome,
who now wore truly desperate expressions.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Speed...
If the energy to move
forward produces heat...

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Then I might be able to do something.
There's no time, so I shall do it immediately.

name: Saotome
text:
Astar-kun?
What on earth are you...?

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Don't worry, Saotome.
I've done something similar
once before with [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Did you forget?
That Christmas night, we created a miracle together, didn't we?

options.text: It was a close call that time too, but...

name: Saotome & Yohack
text: You've done it before!?

name: Yohack
text:
I see!
I completely understand...!

name: Yohack
text:
...No!
I still don't understand at all~!
What on earth does that mean!?

name: Saotome
text:
Astar-kun...
To have stopped a train before,
where did you get such experience...?

options.text: It wasn't exactly a train, but...

text:
Ignoring the two confused individuals,
Astar looked directly into [Player]'s eyes.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
[Player].
Transform me into my first wish's form...
the winter "Santa".

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
That form, which I've worn for so long,
allows me to fully utilize my abilities.

Astar, whose approval was overwritten by [Player],
was back in a crimson Santa suit.

It was the optimized form of his dream,
for Astar to exert his racial characteristics.

And [Player] poured all their ViewPower
to support Astar's actions.

name: Astar
text:
Thank you, voice person.
Thanks to you, I...!

name: Astar
text:
Preparations are complete!
Saotome, tell me the location that's generating
this train's kinetic energy!

name: Saotome
text:
It's the base of all the cars!
EnoRail's anti-gravity drive unit
is installed there!

name: Astar
text:
The base of all the cars, huh...!
That's pretty wide of a range,
but with my current power...!

Receiving Saotome's words,
Astar concentrated all his attention
on exercising his ability.

name: Astar
text:
Now!
I'll dissipate the heat!

Towards EnoRail's base,
Astar deployed flames that absorbed heat.

The rapidly spreading flames,
while dispersing enormous amounts of heat into the water,
illuminated the rails with a bright trajectory.

name: Yohack
text:
Amazing, Astar-san!
The brake is working properly!
At this rate, surely...!

name: Astar
text:
I see...!
That's good, then...!

As the speed steadily decreased,
beads of sweat formed on Astar's forehead.

name: Astar
text:
...Don't worry, [Player].
As long as you're by my side,
I can do anything.

name: Astar
text:
Even if it's something
like creating a miracle,
I'll do it again and again...!

Astar smiled fearlessly,
and made the flames glow even brighter.
And then—

The sea train EnoRail
came to an emergency stop just 50cm
before the point where the rails disappeared.

name: Saotome
text:
It's a miracle...!
EnoRail...
EnoRail has stopped...!

name: Yohack
text:
We did it!
You're amazing, Astar-san!
To think you can do such a thing with your flames!

name: Yohack
text:
Thanks to Astar-san,
all of us were saved...!
Thank you very much, truly!

name: Astar
text:
No, Yohack.
This miracle was created by all of us.

name: Astar
text:
Yohack, Saotome.
And you too, [Player].

name: Astar
text:
Without any one of us,
we wouldn't have been able to achieve
the miracle of stopping EnoRail.

options.text: I'm glad we didn't give up...

text:
Thus, thanks to the heroes' desperate efforts,
EnoRail was safely stopped.

name: Joezen
text:
Welcome back, [Player]-san!
I'm truly glad you're all safe!

name: Kiloc
text:
As expected of you, [Player]-chan!
You, who never give up, were
the best this time too!

name: Kiloc
text:
...Ah.
The monsters that appeared at the station,
we kicked them out immediately after that.

name: Joezen
text:
If me and the Captain combine our strengths,
monsters of that level are
child's play for us!

options.text: Thank you for protecting us, Kiloc!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe!
I declared it at the beginning, didn't I?
That I'd "do my job properly".
I'm a man who keeps his promises, you know?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Kiloc
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah~ but that made me extra tired today~!
I'd like a special prize from you, [Player]-chan~!

options.text: Joezen-kun, it's thanks to you sending us off!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Joezen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe!
I thought sending you off with tailwinds and high waves might have been a bit rough, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Joezen
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player]-san, I believed that you and the others would surely ride the waves skillfully!

text:
Kiloc and Joezen, who brightly welcomed
[Player] and the others' return—

Noticed the person Saotome was carrying on his back,
and wore solemn expressions.

name: Joezen
text:
I saw the battle live...
Shiratori-san was the one trying
to destroy EnoRail, wasn't he?

name: Kiloc
text:
.........
It seems that there were reasons behind his actions,
but have you actually heard about that?

name: Saotome
text:
...In fragments, yes.
I intend to hear the rest
when he wakes up.

name: Saotome
text:
Just in case, I'm holding his device.
Even if he wakes up and tries to fight,
he shouldn't be able to transform now.

Following Saotome after his words,
the group walked towards Enoshima Observatory.

name: Senthak
text:
[Player]-kun!
I was really surprised!
To think you could show such a flashy performance!

name: Alend
text:
That was splendid, [Player].
Of course, I believed that if you, Saotome
and the others were there, you would definitely stop it.

name: Alend
text:
We also had some monsters appear on our side,
but Senthak took care of all of them.
Thanks to that, I could concentrate on using my ability.

name: Senthak
text:
Of course!
Without Alend-kun's support,
it would have been a truly dangerous situation!

options.text: Thank you for doing your best, Senthak!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-kun, your figure
observing without flinching even in a pinch,
was truly cool!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Senthak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Anyway,
now that you're back safely,
I can finally relax!

options.text: Alend-san, it's thanks to your support!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's just a matter of putting the right person in the right place.
I fulfilled my role.
If I could show results, that's what matters most.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
And you all fulfilled your roles beyond imagination.
You truly did well.

text:
Knowing of [Player]'s return,
the islanders and tourists gathered.

name: Island Kid
text:
So cool!
Thank you very much for protecting EnoRail—!

name: Islander
text:
As expected of the local heroes, everyone!
To think you would protect Enoshima like this!

name: Tourist
text:
For a moment, I wondered what would happen,
but it was great to see my favorite heroes
in action so close by~!

name: Astar
text:
Hmm...
Don't the people on this island
lack a bit of tension?

name: Yohack
text:
Ah, ahaha...
For now, let's just be satisfied
that everyone is happy, okay?

options.text: They're tough in a way, or rather...
It's a good thing that they're energetic, I suppose.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
I was watching the live stream~!
Dad, I never thought you
would become a hero!

name: Saotome
text:
Hey Yuto!
Don't just hug me out of nowhere...!

name: Kiloc
text:
Hah-hah!
Saotome-san's son is
full of energy!

name: Kiloc
text:
Joezen-"kun" used to be like this
when he was little, too, so friendly.
"Papa~ papa~", he'd say.

name: Joezen
text:
Captain!
Please stop saying that in front of everyone!
I-It's embarrassing...

name: Saotome
text:
Sorry, Joezen-kun.
Kiloc-kun probably didn't mean any harm.

name: Saotome
text:
As parents, you can't possibly forget
your children's cute memories.

name: Saotome
text:
How about, for once,
you forgive him
for this old man's sake?

name: Joezen
text:
I-Is that how it is?
If Saotome-san says so,
I won't say anything anymore, but...

Saotome's son spoke to Joezen,
who looked away in embarrassment.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
Joezen-kun, your dad is a hero too,
just like mine!

name: Saotome's Son
text:
I'm so happy that my Dad became a hero,
but what do you think about yours, Joezen-kun?

Joezen, in response to being asked,
quietly whispered into Yuto's ear.

name: Joezen
text:
...Well, let's see.
It's a secret from my dad, but—

name: Joezen
text:
I think my dad, the protector of Estevolta,
is incredibly cool.
...Though his womanizing habit is a flaw.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
Right!?
Having a hero dad,
is really cool, right!?

name: Joezen
text:
Yuto-kun!?
Please don't shout that out loud...!

Amidst such harmonious commotion,
a certain person woke up.

The person who had been unconscious
since the battle on EnoRail.

name: Shiratori
text:
Ugh...!
Th-This place...

name: Saotome
text:
Shiratori-kun!
You're awake!?

name: Shiratori
text:
[Player]-san...
Saotome-san...

name: Shiratori
text:
Did I fail again...
to protect the heroes...?

Shiratori, with a pale face,
struggled to stand up, and
collapsed when he couldn't.

It was clear to everyone that Shiratori
had no strength left to fight.

name: Saotome
text:
Shiratori-kun!
Don't overexert yourself...!

name: Islander
text:
Shiratori-san...
To think you would try to
destroy EnoRail...

name: Islander
text:
You, who always worked hard for the village
with Saotome-san,
why would you do such a thing...?

name: Islander
text:
You, to think I believed
you were a good person...!

The islanders, who had watched the battle on EnoRail
via live stream, expressed their feelings
to Shiratori, who had woken up.

The fact that their hometown's lifeline,
which supports their lives, was almost destroyed,
was enough to infuriate the islanders.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
Everyone, wait!
Shiratori-san, as Enoshiman,
has always protected us, you know!?

name: Island Kid
text:
Even then,
he protected us with his life...!

name: Shiratori
text:
Yuto-kun...
And, everyone...

name: Enoshiman
text:
To harm the people of Enoshima,
and the heroes any further—

name: Enoshiman
text:
I, Enoshiman, will not allow it!
Now, take this—!!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Enoshiman
Final Blade!!!

name: Saotome's Son
text:
Don't you say such things when we
haven't even thanked him for that...!

Hearing the children's words,
who desperately protected Shiratori
with tearful expressions—

The islanders remembered
the spectacular scene where Enoshiman
defeated the monsters.

name: Islander
text: Th-That's...

And, towards the hesitating islanders,
Shiratori opened his mouth.

name: Shiratori
text:
No, I don't even deserve
words of gratitude from anyone.

name: Shiratori
text:
It's an undeniable fact that I tried to destroy EnoRail,
and tried to make Enoshima uninhabitable.

name: Shiratori
text:
Not only that,
I have been deceiving everyone
all this time.

name: Shiratori
text:
The true Enoshiman,
that is not me.

Shiratori explained the situation
to the astonished islanders.

That there was once a true local hero
in Enoshima.
That he was saved by that person.

And, that he continued to be Enoshiman
after that person died in a mutual attack with a monster.

At Shiratori's confession,
the islanders were speechless.
Even after receiving the explanation—

They couldn't recall the distorted memories,
twisted and imperfectly supplemented
by the monster damage.

name: Islander
text:
To think there was another Enoshiman...
I can't believe it so easily...

name: Islander
text:
But Shiratori-san doesn't
seem to be lying either...

Gratitude, fear, anger, confusion.
Various emotions intertwined
in the islanders' hearts.

Amidst such heavy silence,
Saotome broke it.

name: Saotome
text:
Everyone...
We've always been completely
reliant on Enoshiman.

name: Saotome
text:
Because of that, when the previous
Enoshiman fell prey to a monster...
We didn't even realize it.

Saotome suddenly and clearly remembered.
The man with a similar physique to Shiratori—
the previous Enoshiman.

That vividly recalled figure,
like mist clearing away from his mind,
greatly tightened Saotome's chest.

name: Saotome
text:
And most of all, Enoshiman—
We made Shiratori-kun bear the burden alone,
and fight monsters all by himself...

name: Saotome
text:
What we've done
might be even more sinful
than the act of destroying EnoRail.

At Saotome's words,
the islanders showed various reactions.

Some pondered.
Some tilted their heads.
And some nodded, bowing their heads.

name: Islander
text:
Indeed, we
never really thought about
Enoshiman's true identity...

name: Islander
text:
We thought we were grateful,
but we just assumed he was "that kind of hero"
and never even questioned being protected.

Receiving the islanders' words,
Saotome opened his mouth again.

name: Saotome
text:
We should have faced
the monsters and heroes
more properly.

name: Saotome
text:
If Shiratori-kun has committed a sin,
I think I have committed various sins too.
So—

name: Saotome
text:
For once, could you
leave this problem to me?

At Saotome's words,
the islanders nodded, one after another.

name: Saotome
text:
[Player]-kun and the others,
please come with me.

And Saotome, along with [Player] and the others,
took Shiratori into a room in the observatory.

options.text: (Let's prepare for transformation just in case.)

name: Saotome
text:
Coming here brings back memories.
Shiratori-kun and I, we have
cleaned the observatory together.

name: Saotome
text:
Surely, this observatory too
will become a tourist spot
in Enoshima.

name: Saotome
text:
Though, those days
feel like a distant past...

Saotome, who spoke nostalgically,
turned to Shiratori and bowed deeply.

name: Saotome
text:
Shiratori-kun.
I'm truly sorry for everything until now.

name: Saotome
text:
I made you bear the burden alone,
and fight monsters all by yourself...

name: Saotome
text:
I didn't even once care
about Enoshiman's true identity.

name: Shiratori
text:
There's no need for you to apologize.
To fight on as Enoshiman,
that was my own wish.

name: Shiratori
text:
Most of all,
I ultimately tried to destroy Enoshima.
Saotome-san's precious hometown.

name: Shiratori
text:
And most importantly,
I hurt the heroes I was supposed to
protect with these hands...

name: Yohack
text:
...Shiratori-san.
If you said that you've hurted me,
I really don't think you did.

name: Yohack
text:
Shiratori-san, you have also fought for us.
I understand that kindness perfectly.

name: Astar
text:
...Don't underestimate us, Shiratori.
In the first place, we're not so weak
as to be defeated by your attacks.

name: Astar
text:
So, stop giving us that gloomy face.
Because, we haven't lost anything at all.

name: Shiratori
text:
You all, truly...
You're truly too strong and kind...

name: Saotome
text:
Shiratori-kun, you're battered too.
If you say you hurt someone,
then I'm just as guilty.

name: Saotome
text:
EnoRail is also safe.
The rails need repair, but
Shiratori-kun, you didn't break them.

name: Shiratori
text:
But,
the photo spot on the beach...

name: Saotome
text:
That was certainly surprising,
but Shiratori-kun, now that I know your wish,
I can guess the reason.

name: Saotome
text:
You tried to disperse the approval
gathering in Enoshima, didn't you?

name: Saotome
text:
Besides, according to Senthak-kun's assessment,
it seems it can be "repaired" overnight.
You don't need to worry about it!

name: Shiratori
text:
Unlike me, who destroyed the photo spot,
attempted to sink EnoRail into the sea,
and tried to abandon Enoshima—

name: Shiratori
text:
Everyone who is a true hero
thinks about saving everything they see.
That includes even me...

name: Shiratori
text:
However, I
don't deserve to receive
the heroes' kindness...!

Saotome spoke persuasively to Shiratori,
who cried out in pain, his face buried in his hands.

name: Saotome
text:
I don't think you need to be qualified
to receive kindness from others. As long as you're alive,
it's natural to rely on someone.

name: Saotome
text:
Shiratori-kun, you too,
as the one and only local hero,
fought for the island with your life, didn't you?

name: Saotome
text:
Even though you had various thoughts,
you certainly showed kindness
to everyone you saw.

name: Saotome
text:
Then,
Shiratori-kun, now
it's your turn to be saved-

name: Saotome
text:
Was it a bit too
convenient to think that way?

name: Shiratori
text:
Saotome-san...
That's not true...

name: Saotome
text:
I'm done letting you
fight on your own.
Now, I'm a hero too!

name: Saotome
text:
Shiratori-kun.
From now on, will you
protect Enoshima with me?

Saotome's smiling voice
contained the same warm kindness
as the true Enoshiman.

At least, that's how Shiratori
felt it.

name: Shiratori
text:
Saotome-san.
You... truly...
did become a hero.

Shiratori's voice trembled,
and he nodded towards Saotome.

name: Shiratori
text:
Saotome-san.
Thank you very much.

name: Shiratori
text:
...However,
I cannot remain in a place
I once tried to destroy.

name: Shiratori
text:
Even if, the islanders themselves
have the heart to forgive me.

name: Yohack
text:
Shiratori-san...
Don't jump to conclusions like that,
and don't carry it all by yourself.

name: Yohack
text:
Shiratori-san, you and everyone on the island
just haven't had a chance to talk before,
but if you talk properly...

name: Yohack
text:
You'll surely understand each other!
Shiratori-san, even if you don't want to,
I'll persuade everyone. So—

name: Astar
text:
That's enough, Yohack.
Even if others forgive, sometimes
one cannot forgive oneself.

name: Astar
text:
Most of all,
Shiratori's wish has changed.
He can no longer return to "that form" (Enoshiman).

Astar, who calmed Yohack,
looked directly at Shiratori.

name: Astar
text:
...Shiratori.
The path you are trying to walk
is undoubtedly a treacherous one.

name: Astar
text:
As a person, you cannot live alone.
There are things that can only be done
when someone who supports you is by your side.

name: Astar
text:
That should be true for you too.
By remaining in Enoshima,
there are wishes you can grasp.

name: Astar
text:
...Even so, will you
leave this island?

Shiratori nodded at Astar's words,
and spoke weakly.

name: Shiratori
text:
At that time,
I lost the form of my dream—
the form of Enoshiman.

name: Shiratori
text:
Seeing you all get hurt,
the form of my dream changed.

name: Shiratori
text:
However, precisely because of that,
I think I was able to survive after using
"that technique" with the resolve to self-destruct.

name: Shiratori
text:
And most of all,
what I wish for now is
"a world where heroes don't get hurt".

options.text: A world where heroes don't get hurt...

name: Shiratori
text:
Enoshima is beginning to change.
It won't leave Saotome-san,
now the protector of this island, alone.

name: Shiratori
text:
Even now, somewhere else,
I want to save heroes
who are fighting alone. So—

name: Saotome
text:
—So what?
What are you trying to say,
Shiratori-kun!

name: Saotome
text:
Even if you're not Enoshiman,
you are undeniably a member of this island!

name: Saotome
text:
You can atone for your mistakes—
You and I, can't the both of
us start over in this village!?

name: Saotome
text:
Don't worry about me,
just live happily wherever you move!
And then—

name: Saotome
text:
—And then,
say hello to your wife and son for me!

The words he had swallowed countless times before,
the emotions he had endured not to express,
burst forth like a broken dam.

name: Saotome
text:
I beg you...
Please don't go,
Shiratori-kun...!

name: Saotome
text:
If you're all alone out there,
what on Earth are you going to do...?

name: Saotome
text:
From now on,
together with me in Enoshima...!

name: Shiratori
text:
Saotome-san... Although you all
succeeded in stopping me, I have already done
something that cannot be undone.

name: Shiratori
text:
If "I" hadn't come to Enoshima...
I wouldn't have hurt kind people
like you and the villagers.

options.text: Why don't you start over as a hero?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-san...
You too, you could say such kind words to me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
However, that would be difficult.
My wish is forming an image in a place far removed from hero activities.

options.text: I won't deny your wish, Shiratori-san.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text: You didn't deny what I wanted to do that time either.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm not in a position to say my gratitudes, but...
[Player]-san, thank you very much.

options.text: I won't let you get away until you atone for your sins.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, Saotome-san.
[Player]-san is right.
Even if the villagers forgive me...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text: What I've done so far is absolutely unforgivable.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shiratori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
However, even so...
To fulfill my wish, I cannot let myself be captured.

text:
Even after hearing Saotome's words,
Shiratori's resolve did not waver.

And Shiratori averted his gaze from Saotome
and looked at [Player].

name: Shiratori
text:
I don't think my words now hold much value,
and I don't expect you to believe me.
But...

name: Shiratori
text:
Having you fight beside me
was very... very reassuring.
Those words are not a lie.

name: Shiratori
text:
Most of all, the feeling of
refusing to leave a hero by themselves
is what I felt first.

name: Shiratori
text:
[Player]-san, you were thinking
the same thing as me in the past.
That, made me really happy.

Soon after, Shiratori
suddenly disappeared.
No one knew where he went.

note:
wdym he just vanished!?????
did he just fade into dust in front of 4 pairs of eyes!?????
give me back my Shiratori TwT

though he did get a 5* sprite, so guess who's an upcoming limited now

text:
Even so,
life in Enoshima continues.

Finale:
Until We Meet Again

Approximately one week has passed
since Shiratori left Enoshima.

Enoshima's excitement lost momentum
due to the monster damage—

And proportionally,
the appearance of monsters also gradually
began to calm down.

name: Island Kid
text:
Take this!
"Blessing"!
Sommer Lächeln!

name: Island Kid
text:
Not yet!
"Unlock"!
Omnes Exitus!

On the beach at night, several children
were happily running around
imitating heroes.

The hologram of the photo spot,
created by Senthak, softly
illuminated their figures.

name: Joezen
text:
Even though
Senthak-san made the photo spot
with a hologram...

name: Joezen
text:
And EnoRail has resumed operation,
not many customers are coming.

name: Kiloc
text:
That can't be helped.
It's right after such a commotion, you know.

name: Alend
text:
...Rather, for me,
it's surprising that even any
tourists are visiting right now.

name: Senthak
text:
According to Saotome-kun,
most of the visitors are from
Orient City, apparently?

name: Yohack
text:
[Player]-san.
What does that mean?

name: Yohack
text:
It's not just because
it's relatively close
if you take EnoRail, right?

name: Astar
text:
I heard from Monomasa before.
The residents of Orient City
are used to monster commotions.

name: Astar
text:
This level of monster commotion
might be an everyday occurrence for them.

name: Saotome
text:
Or...
It might be a sign of trust
in the heroes!

Saotome, who was strangely cheerful
despite the decrease in tourists, joined the conversation.

options.text: You said there was a message for the office...

name: Saotome
text:
That's right!
Although I'm still treated as an apprentice,
I've officially become a hero!

name: Astar
text:
...Saotome.
The appearance of monsters has begun to calm down, but
what are you going to do about the event?

name: Saotome
text:
Of course,
I haven't given up on Enoshima's revitalization,
but considering the monsters...

Saotome groaned and held his head
about the suspended event.

name: Alend
text:
That's right. Indeed,
if Enoshima prospers as a tourist destination,
it will certainly gather approval.

name: Alend
text:
...However, there's no need to worry excessively.
We can even hire heroes with the increased income.

name: Alend
text:
Such development is not limited
to Earth or Enoshima.

name: Alend
text:
The development of cities and
the employment of heroes
are inseparable wheels.

name: Senthak
text:
Besides, from now on,
Saotome-kun will be at the center,
protecting Enoshima, right?

name: Saotome
text:
Of course!
I also intend to acquire a hero license
and become an official local hero!

name: Saotome
text:
So as a result,
I researched several hero agencies,
and decided to rely on UEHA.

name: Saotome
text:
According to what Yuto told me,
many civil servant heroes
belong to UEHA.

name: Saotome
text:
As a village office staff member,
I thought it would be just right for me.

options.text: They had many heroes with hero names, I think.

name: Yohack
text:
Is that so?
Then, Saotome-san, will you also
get a hero name for yourself?

name: Saotome
text:
That's the plan. At UEHA Japanese Branch,
each hero uses a code name
for their hero activities.

name: Saotome
text:
There's a saying,
"When in Rome, do as the Romans do."
I intend to follow that too.

name: Astar
text:
...I see.
So, what kind of hero name
do you intend to use?

Asked by Astar,
Saotome took a slightly deeper breath.

name: Saotome
text:
"Enoshiman No. 2".
That, I have chosen to be my hero name.

name: Saotome
text:
I thought about various things myself, but
I realized this was the only one.

name: Saotome
text:
Someday in the future,
when "No. 1" (Shiratori-kun) returns to Enoshima...

name: Saotome
text:
We shall protect Enoshima together,
that's what I believe in!

name: Saotome
text:
Until that day comes,
I intend to protect Enoshima
as Enoshiman No. 2.

name: Astar
text:
...I see.
It's a good name that shows
a glimpse of your resolve, Saotome.

name: Yohack
text:
It's just like you, Saotome-san,
and it's a wonderful name!
To witness the birth of a new local hero!

And so, the night of the
final day of the event arrived.

The heroes gathered on Enoshima Beach at night,
watching the grand fireworks display.

name: Saotome
text:
[Player]-kun,
Astar-kun, Yohack-kun!
Finally, the calendar is complete!

[Player] and the others gently looked
at the completed "Local Hero Swimsuit Calendar".

The calendar handed to Saotome
was vibrantly decorated with various photos
taken in Enoshima.

name: Yohack
text:
This is
a photo from when we all
challenged marine sports, right!?

name: Astar
text:
This is a photo of the beach flag, huh.
Looking at it objectively like this
is quite interesting.

name: Saotome
text:
Wahahaha!
At that time, Enoshima was so lively,
it was truly fun!

name: Saotome
text:
I just keep remembering various things.
Preparing for the event
with Shiratori-kun—

name: Saotome
text:
Playing beach flag with Enoshiman,
and fighting monsters together...

Naturally,
Enoshiman's figure is not present
in the latter half of the calendar.

Instead,
Enoshiman No. 2, smiling brightly,
adorns the latter half of the calendar.

[Player] and the others thought of
Shiratori, who had disappeared.

name: Yohack
text:
Shiratori-san...
I wonder where he is now...

name: Astar
text:
I don't know that, but
the day might come when we meet again.

name: Yohack
text:
That's right.
We'll surely meet again!

name: Saotome
text:
It's just as you two say!
I believe that Shiratori-kun will someday
return to Enoshima!

name: Saotome
text:
Until then,
inheriting Shiratori-kun's feelings,
and the feelings of the previous Enoshiman—

name: Saotome
text:
I will protect Enoshima
as "Enoshiman No. 2"!

Saotome declared that,
and powerfully thrust his fist upward.

Saotome's expression, illuminated
by multicolored lights...

To [Player]'s eyes,
he seemed to be crying,
and also smiling.

Thus,
the eventful crowdfunding project,
"Local Heroes Assemble in Enoshima"—

Was deeply etched as an unforgettable memory
in the hearts of the heroes and the land of Enoshima.

Live A Hero! Special Episode
"Enoshima Last Resort"
~Local Heroes Assemble!~
—END
